duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the production and post production of photo and video assets, including sourcing and hiring talent and crew based on creative direction.
Manage studio crew and photo shoots, ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations.
Create shot lists and call sheets for all shoots, as well as saving final assets' files and maintaining an up-to-date record of all creative assets.
Manage campaign content development for both photo and video, monitoring projects through completion to ensure on-time delivery.
Handle all image requests and provide necessary and updated imagery to relevant departments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in film, photography, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
